Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. After careful consideration and analysis, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $12000. This price reflects not only the high quality and functionality of the product but also the unique value it can bring to your business or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
